title: OCE FGC (Friendly Gaming Community) Discord Server

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
Hello fellow League players.
After having yet another match with players that flame, I decided to make my own discord server. 
This server aims to be a safe place for all players, including queer, female and autistic gamers. Dont worry about your rank everyone is welcome! 
The server is also open to CSGO and Overwatch players :) 

Come and join! As long as youre a nice player of course!
